Package service

Class EditionServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
service.EditionServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IEditionService, IGenericService
@Provider @ApplicationScoped public class EditionServiceImpl extends Object implements IEditionService
The EditionServiceImpl class implements the CRUD wrapper methods as defined in the IEditionService interface.
